title: Fat Sal's with Matt Christman
itunes:title: Fat Sal's with Matt Christman
description:
Matt Christman (Chapo Trap House) joins the 'boys to discuss favorite chains, the One Chip Challenge, and Wahlburgers before a review of Fat Sal's. Plus, another edition of Slop Quiz.

Want more Doughboys? Check out our Patreon!: https://patreon.com/doughboys

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
